definitions.definition: An option allowing a gamer to resume play after game over, when all lives have been lost.
A statement which causes a loop to start executing the next iteration, skipping the statements following it.
To proceed with (doing an activity); to prolong (an activity).
definitions.example: Do you want me to continue to unload these?

definitions.definition: To retain (someone or something) in a given state, position, etc.
To remain in a given place or condition; to remain in connection with; to abide; to stay.

definitions.example: This meeting has been continued to the thirteenth of July.
